```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
```
```{r}
df <- here::here("r/stats2021fall/homework4", "IDZ4_Data_504020121.csv") %>%
  read.csv %>%
  filter(Variant == 4) %>%
  select(!Variant) %>%
  mutate(A=as.factor(A), B=as.factor(B))
head(df)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(df, columns = 1:3, ggplot2::aes(colour=B))
```
```{r}
list("general" = Y ~ A * B, "additive" = Y ~ A + B, "a_only" = Y ~ A, "b_only" = Y ~ B) %>% lapply(function(formula) { aov(formula, data = df) })
```
```{r}
df <- df %>%
  group_by(Visit) %>%
  summarize(MeanY = mean(Y)) %>%
  inner_join(df)
df <- df %>%
  group_by(Visit, A) %>%
  summarize(AMeanY = mean(Y)) %>%
  inner_join(df)
df <- df %>%
  group_by(Visit, B) %>%
  summarize(BMeanY = mean(Y)) %>%
  inner_join(df)
df %>% ggplot(aes(Visit, Y)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = B, size = A)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_line(aes(Visit, MeanY))
df %>% ggplot(aes(Visit, AMeanY, group=A, color=A)) + geom_line() + theme_minimal()
df %>% ggplot(aes(Visit, BMeanY, group=B, color=B)) + geom_line() + theme_minimal()
pairs(df)
pairs(df %>% select(Y, ID, A, B))
```
```{r}
# Kolmogorov test
df.t1 <- df[(df$Visit == 2 & df$A == 1),]
df.t2 <- df[(df$Visit == 2 & df$A == 0),]
ks.test(df.t1$Y, df.t2$Y)
```
